participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting over music.
participant_1.background: I am in good shape and my weight is healthy. I enjoy trying new foods, but my favorite dishes are usually simple and comforting. I love all my pets equally, but my dog is especially special to me because she's my best friend. I have been married 3 times. I especially enjoy listening to the band The Mutineers.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Playful and family-oriented, with a passion for music and creativity despite personal challenges.
participant_2.background: I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery. I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore. I am pretty close with my family. I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work. I speak fluent Italian.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
Same here. I'm just listening to some music. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into Disney music right now. I love the music from the new movie, Frozen.
Oh, I love that movie! The music is so good. I'm really into the band The Mutinyers right now. They're a local band here in Portland.
Oh, I've never heard of them. I'll have to check them out. Do you play any instruments?
I used to play the piano, but I haven't played in a while. I'd like to get back into it someday.
That's awesome! I used to play the cello, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I still love music, even though I can't play an instrument anymore.
That's good to hear. Music is such a great thing.
It is. It can make you feel so many different emotions.
It can. It's a great way to express yourself.
It is. I love listening to music when I'm feeling down. It always cheers me up.
Me too. Music is the best
